plot: Two former students of a strict religious school decide to go back during the summer vacation and make the teachers go through all the suffering that they imposed on both of them.
title: F.E.N.
plot_es: Two former students of a strict religious school decide to go back during the summer vacation and make the teachers go through all the suffering that they imposed on both of them.
plot_en: Two former students of a strict religious school decide to go back during the summer vacation and make the teachers go through all the suffering that they imposed on both of them.
